title: Connection problem or invalid mmi code error
content:
I am in China. Both my pixel XL and pixel2 XL cannot using USSD command (like *#06#) now. It works well maybe one year ago, I cannot remember exact time.
Now, after sending USSD command, I can see the network indicator shows the network changed from Lte for several seconds, then the error message shows "Connection problem or invalid mmi code error"

I thought it may be something wrong with the system, so I just flashed my pixel XL with marlin-qp1a.191005.007.a1-factory-c27241e0.zip,  but the problem still exists.

I tired to modify "Prefered network type" to Lte, it does not work at all.
